key_risks: Supply chain disruptions impacting production and profitability
Legal disputes with Parker Hannifin Corp. over asbestos-related liabilities and breach of contract claims
Economic sensitivity tied to the automotive industry and consumer spending
Regulatory compliance challenges in environmental and safety standards
controversies: Long-standing legal dispute with Parker Hannifin Corp.
Historical labor disputes such as the Tran v. Standard Motor Products case
environmental_issues: Complex environmental regulations impacting compliance costs and product development timelines
social_issues: Potential vulnerabilities in labor relations despite a Code of Ethics
governance_issues: Legal liabilities and reputational risks from ongoing litigation
